sentences.sContent: So eruption of volcanoes is one way of producing igneous rocks.
sentences.sContent_eng: So eruption of volcanoes is one way of producing igneous rocks.
sentences.sCn: 那么火山喷发是形成火山岩的一种方式罗。

sentences.sContent: The earth movements associated with the orogeny triggered an extensive igneous activity.
sentences.sContent_eng: The earth movements associated with the orogeny triggered an extensive igneous activity.
sentences.sCn: 伴随着造山运动的地壳运动出发了一场广泛的火成活动。

trans.tranOther: igneous rocks are formed from lava(= hot liquid rock )
